A data scientistâ€™s skill set comes from various expertise, irrespective of the background one comes from. However, the data science foundation is built on four pillars; i.e., Statistics, Computer Science/Software Programming (technical skills), Business Acumen, and Communication Skills. Each of these skills plays a major role in a data science professional.
